messages.1000085785:
Force feeds a concoction of bubbles to your allies. The effect depends on the number of bubbles used (minimum 2).
#y2 Bubbles - STR/AGI/INT: +{0}%
4 Bubbles - Incoming Healing: +{1}%
6 Bubbles - Cooldown Recovery Speed: +{2}%
Duration: {3} sec
messages.1000056674:
Press the regular attack button when getting hit to spray enemies with sleeping gas and then dodge back.
#yMagic Damage: {0}%+{1}
Duration: {2} sec
Sleep Chance: {3}%
Can also be used by performing a special attack after Injection.

Smash enemies with a gigantic ice fist. Has a chance to freeze targets. Use a normal attack while dodging to trigger this skill. Use normal attacks afterwards to trigger Volcano Punch.
